name: Maverick Boots
description: There's nothing elegant about this patchwork hardsuit. It mixes various materials and technology from the Heleus Cluster and its microframe computer runs a jumble of barely linked programs. Despite this, or because of it, the armor is highly effective in combat, with targeting and thermal distribution systems second to none.
setBonus: Set bonus (2 of 4): Roll one additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a weapon attack.
Set bonus (4 of 4): Whenever you roll an 18 or higher on a weapon attack roll, consider it a critical hit.
